content: I really love the game
Awesome

Too much back and forth causing a lot of useless looking with NO HINT or Strategy Guide availability. I don't mind working to solve, like in Hidden Object Adventure games. BUT THIS GAME IS NOT FOR ME! UNINSTALLING...

I Love this game. Great story and mystery. The Vera character kept me glued to this game and her abilities were awesome. I hope this game has an sequel. I would love to see her child grow up and be an detective like Vera. I give this game 10 stars!
Great storyline and play
Great game! I loved Kathy Rain, and this one is done just as well. Perfect voiceovers and I replayed until I got all the achievements. Can't wait for the next one from this studio!

If u want more people to buy or look into this game...take or change the picture of that hidious beast on the cover picture, that evil pushing he-she joke. That alone is making me turn this game down. Push your agendas at a parade. Not where children are.
For me it was super buggy, crashed three times In the first five minutes of download. Not sure what the deal is. Edit: reinstalled it and all fixed. üëç
replyContent: So sorry to hear that! We'd love to help you debug these crashes. Would you mind sending us screenshots of the problem to touchme@rawfury.com? Would greatly appreciate it, thanks!

content: Great game!

Man oh man, yet another one that kept me glued to the screen till the end! I can't believe it, I should've tried this type of game years ago, I'm loving these stories! This one was just a bunch of different adjectives that you'll have to conclude for yourself, but it's definitely good. Easily worth 5 stars and every penny that they charge for it. I'm on play pass so it was free for me but I'd be willing to throw another $5 at the devs just because of their originality and creativity. Sequel?ü§∑üòÅ
I really enjoyed this! Great game!
Wow. Game as a story telling medium. Heavy on moral relativity. Lots of logical ways to solve puzzles. Fernir
This game is perfection. Great story, one of my favorite games to be sure.

Hi-res pixel art allowing for that painted look, fully and well acted voice overs, and an engaging story full of mystery. One of the best adventure titles that I've played. Everything that you do in this game makes logical sense and never felt contrived no matter how complex the task ended up being. Multiple ways to accomplish said tasks and multipe endings even gives this game replayabillity not usually found in this genre. Loved it!
Would have been 5 stars but are playing for over 4 hours I went off to eat now all I get is a black screen with a message saying can't find files üò¢üò¢

Just finished after binging for two days! Loved it so much. Nice retro graphics and interface give a moody dystopian feel. Captivating choice-based story with multiple outcomes for the narrative and gameplay. Doesn't spoon-feed and can be genuinely challenging at points, making you feel satisfied when you solve a situational puzzle. Thanks for making this game! I want more!
Loved the game

Hands down the BEST point and click adventure I have ever played. I couldn't put it down the first day and the second I had free time the next I got right back to it. To describe the story, I would say "Blade Runner 2049" meets "Deus Ex". Thought Provoking and Intuitive, Unique and Nostalgic, Thrilling and Somber. All in all, a perfect blend that I wish I could experience again for the first time!
I love point and click games, and this is just like the ones from LucasArts and Sierra, with its own special twist on the formula. Truly outstanding gameplay, and a great story, too
Better cyberpunk game than cyberpunk 2077
Best game ever
Very easy controls the story is very interesting and engaging. Not many puzzles but it is interactive and you have to think. Loved it!
Brilliant game
Brilliant! Game has very comfortable difficulty of quests without any nonsense. Every action is pretty logical. Bravo, very good adventure!
Epic
Great game, loved it! I only wish that there were more of them or that it was longer! üòä

A definite 10 out of 5 from me. For ¬£4.50?? Bargain! The 2d animation style is retro and attractive. Plot is good and the voice acting is very good. It lacks the humour of a Broken Sword game but it definitely has its own charm. I say a big well done to the developers. As an aside I like the fact you can double-click on an exit and you will be instantly leaving by that exit. I looked up what to do next on several occasions. It is all perfectly logical though. RECOMMENDED!
Cyber punk point and click without the pixel hunting. The dream

Just finished game-- loved it. Well worth time and money spent. Addictive storyline, with a nice sci-fi blend. Game included the human element and making decisions which affected the outcome of the story. Graphics were old school, but good and gave the post dystopian feel to game. Enjoyed the argumentations, it was fun to use them to solve problems. Beautiful music and overall good game play. Thanks guys, had fun. Hope you make more games like this.
Great 90s style point and click adventure game.
The good old point and click. Great story line, great controls. Kind of sad I finished it üòÇ
Would be fun, cant get pass ventalation tube. I examine it but cant talk to alfred about it.
replyContent: 1. Have you scanned the vent tube fingerprints with Karl's Bio so Vera understands that it is important? 2. Alfred is not always helpful to you depending on your previous actions. 3. If Alfred refuses to help, try strength boost on the drink machine in the corner to get a coin to open the vent.

content: Great story and adventure. I played it a couple of times for the different endings.

I really enjoyed this title. It was really great to find this game after having felt "hooked" by Beneath A Steel Sky years ago. I really appreciated the tri-choice based decision game mechanic that gave the main character's dialogue something different to pay attention to. The game art is great and so is the writing. The game expertly combines a detective's narrative set in a futuristic sci-fi environment. Very cool. If you liked this game, you'll need to also try Raw Fury's "Kathy Rain".
Crashes every time my tab 5e sleeps or locks.
I very much enjoyed this.

It really brings back memories of classic style point-and-click adventure game with a sci-fi detective theme and choices affects gameplay. I played twice and my character got different augmentation because my different dialogue choices. This game also runs very smoothly on mobile. The world it is set in is fascinating. I wish for another game set in the same universe.
No difference with playing a quest via computer. The game was especially fun because I could enjoy it playing mobile.
Love this game üôÇ

An old style point&click adventure game with some new tricks. Good dialogues, enthralling detective sci-fi plot, and well adjusted logical puzzles make this gem worth a shot for anyone interested in AGs.
Alcune belle idee ma nel complesso l'ho trovato abbastanza noioso e ripetitivo. Qualche problemino tecnico fa perdere pi√∫ tempo del dovuto. Finito pi√∫ che altro per giustificare l'acquisto.
A good game the dialogue's per character are good to great. This game will make you think of a solution in many ways. So kudos to the team that developed the game. Money worth spending.
The game didn't start
replyContent: Sorry to hear that! Do you get some kind of error message that you could share with us? If you need in depth assistance, please get in touch with us at touchme@rawfury.com and we can try to help you solve this issue.

content: On sale so I got it. After playing through I realised I would have happily paid full price.

An excellent game if you like challenging adventure style games. It's definitely worth the money. It's a good mix of a compelling story, mystery and some puzzle thrown in. Not only that but this game was written to be solved using 3 distinct paths which adds a lot of replayability. It reminds me of the king's quest, monkey island, and Sierra PC games of my youth. Expect this games takes a serious tone which is appropriate for the theme. I will definitely look for more from this developer.
Enjoyable point and click style adventure with multiple paths to the end. Interesting puzzles that can be solved in different ways depending on your character development. I wish there was more!
It's an excellent P&C! I loved it so much I bought it on pc too. ‚ô•Ô∏è
EXCELLENT GAME. LOVED IT. BIG FAN, PLEASE MAKE MORE POINT AND CLICK GAMES LIKE THIS ONE PLEEEEEEASE!
Another great point and click adventure. Very solid. Never felt mad at it.

Think carefully before you buy this game. It is not, in my opinion, of a high enough standard to pay the asking price. The game play and appearance would have wowed us in the 1980's and 90's but not now. I am using a galaxy tab S6 and the game will not run on its highest graphics setting, and I'm not sure why. It is unusual for me to purchase a game and then give up on it but the quality here is low especially at the asking price. All I'm saying is think carefully before you buy it.
Great game üëç

A loving and fresh take on the adventure game, multiple solutions to puzzles based on how you develop the protagonist. Another stunning production by Clifftop games (Kathy Rain is also an excellent addition to the genere). If you like adventure games of the old school, but still want something new... buy this.
Now this game is 100% awesome without doubt...in no way possible is this game a waste of money...you will enjoy it from start to finish
Thanks for the great game. It's good to know the devs made Kathy Rain. 2 wonderful games I've played from you guys.
Great point and click adventure. Had a lot of fun solving this case.
Used the walkthru ALOT.. ü§î Game with a difference. Worth a play

This game is amazing! I chose to embrace the progress, ofc and I developed Frig rhuna personality so the path of the analyzer it said it's rare. Maybe if we all embrace this path, we can all embrace #singularity #transhumanism Amazing game, loved it! Very captivating ‚ù§

Stuck on loading screen. Oppo r11s+. Waited almost 10 minutes to be sure, restarted multiple times, same problem. No other programs running in the background, solid internet connection. Was really looking forward to playing, but atleast google refunded
replyContent: Hi there, sorry that you are having issues. If you would be willing to reconsider, we'd love to help you debug this problem. You can reach us on touchme@rawfury.com.

content: Great game and story
The game says "unable to find game files"
Fantastic game mechanics, music, voice acting and dialogue.

Really fun game! Got stuck a few times but overall it was a perfect challenge. Great graphics and sound, and the plot was engaging. Hope you guys make more apps like this. Definitely worth the money IMO.

This point & click adventure brings some great unique game mechanics to the table, but still manages to give off that "classic" vibe. The pixel art is very attractive and the voice acting is spot on. And it just might be one of the best written murder mysteries I've come across in games. At least, it starts like one. After two in-game days, I have a feeling that the story will move past the whodunnit and that I'm poking around in places I shouldn't. Really immersive. Absolutely brilliant!
Amazing atmosphere, incredible music, and old-school Nintendo Hard.

Loved the story and loved the augmentation mechanic, though you will really only use them rarely. You can get through the whole game in an hour if you're quick which helps get through the replays to get all the achievements. Would love more chapters or content, I think there is a lot of lore to be had in this universe, hinted at by how your choices not only change the outcome and what augs you get, but even some story beats and almost all the dialogue. I want more!
Great story, better characters, interesting twist on puzzles with the abilities. Glad I got this.

I'm shocked at how much I fell in love with this game! Loved the story, characters, voice actors and how the game gives you reasons to replay to try new augments and such. It gave me Blade Runner 1997 flash backs. Thank you for making this!
Really good game, love the different routes you can choose to play and adds some cool options to traditional point and click game.
Great classic point and click adventure game. Good story and not too short.
Liked

OMG! This game is similar to DeusEx one of my all time favourite games. Straight up 5 stars for putting out a game like this. Please tell me that you plan on making more of these. Enjoyed Kathy Rain but I have a feeling that I am going to enjoy this one even more. Good voice acting, üòçAug abilitiesüòç, detective story gameplay...all my favourite things put together. Keep up the good work.
Excellent
Great game. Nice graphics and voice acting. Some puzzles are challenging but rewarding.

This game is amazing. Intriguing storylines and characters, and enough variety to experiment with to keep you interested. There are several endings which add depth to the story and a different angle on events.

Great game with an intricate story and a lot of good puzzle-solving. Never had a single glitch or crash. Worth every penny. Thanks for making it available for Android so we can enjoy it on the go :) Looking forward to more similar games from this developer.
Not particularly challenging. Pretty short.
Great Sci-Fi mystery Game
Loved this game. If you are looking for a classic adventure game experience this is it. Great setting and atmosphere.
I enjoyed the game. The story is good and the puzzles are about right. The voice acting is excellent. But it did crash on me a few times ('cannot find game files') and I didn't like the autosave.
Brilliant!

Another good point and click adventure game. I prefer Whispers of a Machine over Kathy Rain in pretty much every way, lots of good improvements. One negative thing is that the game tends to open too many areas at once, only for the protagonist to tell you that she has no reason to do X, or go to Y. Only after Z has happened you can go there.

Very good indeed. Intelligent and emotive storytelling, with original and genuinely satisfying puzzles. I needed to use a walkthrough a couple of times to deal with one or two of the more obscure scenarios, but enjoyed the challenge of this moderately difficult game.
Good game. I love the atmodphere and the story. :)
Great game, loved the Sci fi noir aspect.
Engaging and well-done old school adventure game.

A glorious return to the classic adventure game. It actually allows you the chance to play detective in a very well written tale. I was pleasantly surprised at nearly every turn, and like any good adventure game, your actions affect the world. Great stuff. I also noticed that almost every issue that I had with Kathy Rain was addressed in this game. It gives me great hope for the next one! Easily worth the price.
Cool so far..

Fantastic! The story line is awesome. The different paths give different outcomes and ways to solve the puzzles. I love the developers' attention to detail! The game has a lot of hidden gems, such as the street artist who adapts the picture based your thoughts about what he is making.

Nice little point and click. Unusual and interesting setting, and some funky abilities. Mostly decent controls and logical puzzles, but stil expect to get stuck sometimes. Sadly it's too short so it's over before it even starts to pick up any pace. Still, for a mobile game it's definitely above average, especially when on sale.
Fantastic. Great story, challenging but puzzles made sense. One of the best games I've played on mobile , wish it wasn't over!
Great game. Great voice acting. Ok story. Good innovation.
Amazing game I would love to play more games made by these guys!

This is an incredibly high quality classic 1990s era point and click adventure game. Your character skills develop depending on how you play, and each combination of skills has unique puzzle solutions available. Fully voiced over. Modern, cohesive plot. Integrated novel user interface additions. Amazing. There is some excess gore, and some of the bigger choices the player ends up making looked a little influenced by the devs preferences.I might have preferred to just play the devs fav end.

Good experience. Top notch voice acting and music. I rarely noticed it was a pixel art 2d game. I was in the world. Only minor complaint, is a few instances of bad game design where you get stuck for really silly reasons. E.g. looking up one of the characters address in the police station. If I didn't do that the game wouldn't go anywhere. Overall though. Highly recommended if you love a story rich point and click adventure. I'd buy another game from this company just for the quality.
Really atmospheric and involving game. It's a lot more ambitious than most other mobile games, well worth playing if you're a fan of the Wadjet Eye series'.
Great plot & acting, and I love that your decisions actually affect gameplay.
Great game, immersive story!
Very fun, well done. The augs- adding a bit of RPG elements- was a great touch.
Awesome. If u love point n click adventure and u live sci fi, this is the game for you.
.I love this game. Very well thought out.
replyContent: Ah! The glitch here is that you seem to have been able to enter the library from the street prematurely. That entrance should be disabled until later in the game. If you avoid the library until you get there from another path, the bug should be resolved. Meanwhile, we'll try to figure out the root cause of the issue.

content: If only more options... An interesting game but too linear.

Simply amazing. If you liked Kathy Rain, you will love WoaM. From the beautiful graphics and music to the engaging P&C gameplay, there's a lot to enjoy here. The story, along with the characters and the voice acting, is something you really have to experience for yourself: A Sci-Fi murder mystery set in the future, with augs and a lot of interesting lore. Play it now!

I loved the story and climate of this game. Loved the dystopian post apocalyptic feel of the game. Loved the Sandinavian small town feel of the game. The only thing keeping this game from great rather than just very good is a few more good puzzles to solve but I suppose it could be argued that the picks you make during some conversations and the use of Vera's abilities are puzzles in themselves.
wont load on pixel just get spinning loading wheel
replyContent: How long did you wait for it to load? Sometimes it can take a while for the game to boot up for the first time. It needs to extract all the downloaded files before the game can start. Other apps running in the background may also slow down the process.

content: Very enjoyable point and click. Main character and some NPC's are well fleshed out. The augmentations are neat and are used to create many branching solutions to puzzles. But the actual storyline is a short and lacks something grandiose.
would not load
replyContent: Hi there, sorry to hear that. How does it not load? Do you get some kind of error message when you try to launch the game?

content: One of the best point and click games. All puzzles are solvable, but need to be creative and notice the information given. Great story.

WOW. JUST WOW. This is up there with one of my all time favourite games, from the music to the voice overs to the plot of the story...pure genius! I am halfway through my first play through but i shall definitely be replaying it to get all the different outcomes! These old school point and click games are my absolute favourite, and this one has been done to perfection. Not to mention the lead character has the same hairstyle as me üòÇüòÇ One cool chick! Congrats devs, I'm a huge fan üëå
A real gem. La noir on your phone
One of the best games on goggle play i just hated to see it end i wish there were more games like this They come out few and far between. Keep up the great work.
Pretty good game!

Hi, I am having difficulty. I got to the junk heap . Spoke to the children. Have went in side the junk heap....but I have been stuck for a week and a half with no progress. I was just making sure there wasn't a glitch because I read you had issues with the junk pile previously. I've tried everything, have found both cassettes in the museum's secret room... just want to know if the game is working properly and I just stink at it lol.

For a long time I've been hearing that point&click games are dead. Here's the proof that is not true. All thats need to be done is spice it up with some modern tricks and the classic formula feels fresh just like in golden age of the genre.
Enjoyable game.
A few hours worth of quite enjoyable gameplay.
Loved the dialog, retro graphics and just plodding around trying to solve the mystery. Love game's like this. Thanks.
Excellent adventure game, unexpected skill uses, decent mystery, multiple endings. I want more.

Absolutely love this game! The story is great and the gameplay is perfect if you like point and click adventure games (though this game adds to that with special abilities based on the decisions you make. Which I love!) I'll probably play it a few more times to see what others augments I get!
Very Interesting Game
Enjoyed playing this game. Nice puzzles and story. Especially liked that there are multiple paths through it.
Nice classic point-and-click (point-and-tap?) adventure game.  Not terribly difficult, but every action is completely logical.  Pretty good art, voice acting, and writing.
very good game
excellent game

hey! I played Kathy Rain and LOVED it a couple years ago, I wrote the developer. He told me he was working on this, albeit without a name. I love this so much. it's really great. Dev's, really, you keep getting better. One question, do you have a mailing list for future games, projects? thanks. üíúüíú
Solid point click adventure with some freshness and choices
Exactly what you want in a point and click. Really fun with great story.
Wow! Powerful story line. I'm sure it has another ending based on choices. Please make more games. Really enjoyed. I loved Kathy Rain also.
Had to resort to walkthroughs a couple times, but that's on me. I really enjoyed this, and played through it twice to see both endings.

If you've played story-driven, retro-style point- n-click games before then you'll know what to expect from this game. The puzzles are mostly easy, but there a couple difficult ones sprinkled in. The story is fairly cookie-cutter for anyone who plays these games a lot, but it was still very engaging. The only downside was pacing, with the climax being a bit disappointing. Overall, I'd highly recommend this game. I enjoyed playing it, and it was worth every penny of the 5 dollars I paid for it.
Great

Good game so far. Would be 5/5, however it has some techical issues: 1. on multiple occasions hotspots are too small on mobile to tap (garbage processor puzzle was very frustrating) and 2. Saving system often looses progress because it's checkpoint based. It's usually a small amount to play again, but still frustrating. That said, I do recommend this game to all point n' click game lovers!
Great point click adventure with its own twists. Good plot, fun characters.
was a great game and hope for similar in the future worth the purchase

Just finished, I've played pretty much every point and click since the 80's and this one holds up well amongst some of my favourites. Gives me a beneath a steel sky vibe. Hoping for a continuation to the story please.
Great storyline with clever puzzles. It's not just something you finish in one go. Completing the game will leave you pondering about what's gonna happen next.
Good adventure with multible endings .

My opinion is very split on this game, because it feels like everything good is let down by something. Voice acting is great, but just overlaid on non-moving faces. Augmentation system is innovative, but don't like how path is triggered through dialogue choices. Story is good, but not at all original. lt also seemed a bit short, dialogue heavy and puzzle light - I got through it quickly and there were maybe 2 interesting puzzles, which doesn't make me want to replay. No offence - good luck.
Enjoyed every moment! Not another ordinary point and click adventure, I actually felt like a crime investigator.

This was pretty good! Writing was really decent and the puzzles were challenging but never illogical. The art direction was a mixed bag it was very practical for the small screen, meaning I could find objects that are usually more difficult to find in other adventures but the backdrops varied in quality. Hope you guys keep making more!

brilliant game! But I think smart scan should be usable on everything in game, maybe giving item composition etc for objects and medical/background info for people. also bio monitor needs to be accurate in people's emotional state, and changing due to peoples responses and emotions during conversation. that way an anomaly would make more sense. eg someone being told of a murder and not being shocked when they should be. people getting angry at certain lines of questioning etc.
